name: Bassilyo
description: '''Lordivino Ignacio''' (born December 11, 1977), known professionally as '''Bassilyo''', is a Filipino [[Rapping|rapper]], [[singer]] and [[songwriter]]. The name Bassilyo is based on the character Basilio, from the novel ''[[Noli Me TÃ¡ngere (novel)|Noli Me Tangere]]''. Bassilyo is also an occasional actor.
